component: Clear description of what you want to achieve (e.g., login page, header, registration form)
technology: Desired framework or language (e.g., React, Vue, HTML/CSS)
features: Bullet list of basic functions to implement (e.g., field validation, submit, local state)
style: Guidelines on design, layout, accessibility, compatibility, or inspirations
output: What you want to receive exactly as a result (e.g., complete code, just component, divided structure)
